ğŸ’October Offers at the Family Medical Complex: ğŸ’
Dermatology Department:
Laser hair removal for underarms (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 200 riyals
Laser hair removal for the face (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 400 riyals
Laser hair removal for the beard (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 400 riyals
Laser hair removal for men's shoulders (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 400 riyals
Laser hair removal for the neck and nape (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 400 riyals
Laser hair removal for underarms and bikini area (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 700 riyals
Laser hair removal for men's back (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 1000 riyals
Laser hair removal for men's chest and abdomen (4 sessions, no touch-ups): 1000 riyals
Laser hair removal for the whole body, excluding back and abdomen (1 session, no touch-ups): 650 riyals
Laser hair removal for legs, arms, underarms, and bikini area (1 session, no touch-ups): 550 riyals
Skin Care:
Carbon laser + Profhilo + Profound: 1800 riyals
Mesotherapy + Dermapen + Carbon laser: 800 riyals
French injection + Carbon laser: 1000 riyals
Royal injection: 1100 riyals
Jalupro Box 3*3: 2000 riyals
Jalupro Super Hydro: 1200 riyals
Hair plasma + Mesotherapy for hair: 900 riyals
Sapphire injection (3 sessions): 2700 riyals
Jalupro Art Box: 3000 riyals
Lola Lift Spanish injection set: 2400 riyals
Botox for forehead and around the eyes: 999 riyals
